description:
Bold sunnies that will give you a crystal clear view of your favourite patio. Some optics get by on understated style, that’s not the Boundary. With their strong lines and a defined structure, these glasses stand out in a sea of wayfarers and aviators. Equipped NXT lenses with colourBOOST technology, you get improved clarity and contrast, as well as vibrant colour reproduction.

  • Fits medium to large faces best
  • NXT® lens material offers improved clarity over standard polycarbonate lenses
  • ColourBoost™ lenses deliver vibrant colours and excellent contrast, making them a great choice for challenging light conditions
  • Gradient tint gradually darkens from the bottom of the lens to the top
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips help keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
name: Ryders Eyewear Boundary Sunglasses
